page.title: 05SERVICES
page.content: The services in our area include, {Sewage Works} ,gas services, water, street cleaning, electricity, postal service, bus routes and bin collection.The bus routes are very important for the old people living in our area.The postal service deliver letters to every house each morning or afternoon.There are small post offices in our area of study and that helps the people who live around it. {Sewage Works.} In our area there is a large{Sewage {Works} which serves most of the west of Plymouth. The waste was pumped into the Tamar via the creek but now it is much cleaner than it used to be .
